cab.content: G.T. 158n a t: tIKSlNotice of Arrival in London of Representatives from India for the Forthcoming Imperial Conference.Dear Sir Maurice Hankey,Mr. Chamberlain desires me to send you this formal notice that the three repre-sentatives from India who will accompany him to the meetings of the War Cabinet, namely, H.K. The Maharaja of BikaniD, Sir James Meston and Sir Satyenha Sinha, have arrived in London.Yours sincerely,(Signed) FRANK LUCAS.India Office.13th March, 1917.
